RelatedSentence: New - home prices in April rose in 44 of the 70 cities tracked by the government , compared with 56 cities in March , the National Bureau of Statistics reported yesterday .
New - home prices in April rose in 44 of the 70 cities tracked by the government , compared with 56 cities in March , the National Bureau of Statistics reported yesterday .
Gains were recorded in the fewest metropolitan areas since October 2012 even as developers offered discounts and the economy slowed , prompting the easing of property curbs in some areas .
One - year interest - rate swaps , the fixed cost to receive the floating seven - day repo , rose two basis points to 3.76 percent , data compiled by Bloomberg show .
The People 's Bank of China gauged demand for 14 - and 28 - day repurchase contracts this week , according to a trader at a primary dealer required to bid at the auctions .
The monetary authority injected a net 44 billion yuan ( $ 7 billion ) into the financial system last week .
Ten - year government bonds yielded 4.19 percent , compared with 4.20 percent at the end of last week , data from the National Interbank Funding Center shows .
